decisions.description: BODEV-1487: Send Customer Billing Onboarding Form when New Business or Expansion Portal Opp is moved to Signature Stage if a form has not been sent. For Renewal, the form is sent on Closed Won and the trigger event is specified in Opportunity [ALF] Closed Won flow.
decisions.name: Send_Customer_Billing_Onboarding_Form
decisions.label: Send Customer Billing Onboarding Form?

rules.name: Send_Form
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND 3 AND 4 AND (8 OR (5 AND 6 AND 7)) AND (9 OR (10 AND 11 AND 12))
rules.label: Send Form

Flow.description: BODEV-4196 Too many SQL Query issue - Opportunity[ASF] Flow Updated the flow to remove Spotdraft primary contact update element thats causing the issue. BODEV-4487 Add Customer Stage on Webdam platform accounts

formulas.name: frmDoAApprovalDate
frmMRRMovement
formulas.expression: AND( OR( NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.QA_Completed_Timestamp__c})), CONTAINS(TEXT({!$Record.StageName}), "Closed")), OR( AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Renewal__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Renewal__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Churn__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Churn__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Expansion__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Expansion__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Contraction__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Contraction__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.New_MRR__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.New_MRR__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Internal_Transfer__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Internal_Transfer__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Churn_Platform_churn__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Churn_Platform_churn__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.New_MRR_Platform_transfer__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.New_MRR_Platform_transfer__c})))) ) )

formulas.name: frmOtherFinanceFieldsChanged
formulas.expression: AND( OR( NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.QA_Completed_Timestamp__c})), CONTAINS(TEXT({!$Record.StageName}), "Closed")), OR( AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.CloseDate}), NOT(ISCHANGED({!$Record.QA_Completed_Timestamp__c})), PRIORVALUE({!$Record.CloseDate}) < TODAY()), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.CloseDate}), PRIORVALUE({!$Record.CloseDate}) < {!$Record.CloseDate}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.End_date_contract__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Startdate_contract__c}), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.MRR_from_Products__c}), PRIORVALUE({!$Record.MRR_from_Products__c}) <> {!$Record.MRR_from_Products__c}) ) )

formulas.name: frmOver50k
formulas.expression:
AND( {!$Record.Email_Alert_50k_Sent__c} = FALSE, OR(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "New Business - Expansion Portal")), OR( AND(ISNEW(), OR( AND(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.CurrencyIsoCode}, "AED"), {!$Record.MRR_from_Products__c} > 16666), AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.CurrencyIsoCode}, "AED")), {!$Record.MRR_from_Products__c} > 4166))),
AND(ISCHANGED({!$Record.MRR_from_Products__c} ), OR(AND(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.CurrencyIsoCode}, "AED"),{!$Record.MRR_from_Products__c} > 16666), AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.CurrencyIsoCode}, "AED")), {!$Record.MRR_from_Products__c} > 4166)))) )

formulas.name: frmSetRecordType
formulas.expression: IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "New Business-Enterprise Cloud", "0120P000000QxSt", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "New Business - Expansion Portal", "0120P000000QxSt", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "Existing Business-Renewal", "0120P000000QxSy", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "Existing Business-Upsell", "0120P000000QxT3", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "Existing Business - Internal Transfer", "0120P000000QxT3", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "Existing Business-Professional Services", "0120P000000R2w1", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "Existing Business - Platform Transfer", "0120P000000QxSt", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "Referral", "0123g000000bpTw", ""))))))))

formulas.name: fromProjectSignedOff
formulas.expression: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "New Business - Expansion Portal"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer")), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Project_Sign_off_Date__c}), NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.Project_Sign_off_Date__c})), {!$Record.Project_Sign_off_Date__c} <= TODAY(), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Account.Customer_Stage__c}, "Onboarding"), {!$Record.CloseDate} >= DATE(2019,08,27), {!$Record.current_user__c} <> '0050P000007hH92' )

Flow.label: Opportunity [ASF] Handler

recordUpdates.label: Update GC Customer Type on Account

textTemplates.name: varChatterSolutionOwner
textTemplates.text: #[New Solution Owner] @[{!$Record.Solution_Owner__c}] You have been selected as solution owner for this opportunity.
